/share/apps/mvapich2/2.1-intel-15/bin/mpif90      -O5 -mkl -warn all -xhost -dynamic -qopt-report=2 -qopt-report-phase=vec -O3 CMakeFiles/pbl.dir/pbl.F90.o  -o pbl  -L/home/nghaisas/PadeOps/dependencies/fftw-3.3.4/lib  -L/home/nghaisas/PadeOps/dependencies/2decomp_fft/lib  -L/home/nghaisas/PadeOps/src -i_dynamic ../../src/libIncompressibleOps.a -l2decomp_fft -lfftw3 ../../src/libPadeOps.a -l2decomp_fft -lfftw3 ../../dependencies/Lib_VTK_IO/build/lib/libVTK_IO.a -Wl,-rpath,/home/nghaisas/PadeOps/dependencies/fftw-3.3.4/lib:/home/nghaisas/PadeOps/dependencies/2decomp_fft/lib:/home/nghaisas/PadeOps/src
